---
title: "table example"
author: "Craig"
date: "2023-10-06"
categories: [code, demo]
image: "thumb.png"
---


This example uses `library(tidyverse)` with knitr for additional table formatting


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- data.frame(player = c('AJ', 'Bob', 'Chad', 'Dan', 'Eric', 'Frank'),
                 position = c('A', 'B', 'B', 'B', 'B', 'A'),
                 points = c(1, 2, 2, 1, 0, 0))

#view data frame
knitr::kable(df[1:6, ], )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
|player |position | points|
|:------|:--------|------:|
|AJ     |A        |      1|
|Bob    |B        |      2|
|Chad   |B        |      2|
|Dan    |B        |      1|
|Eric   |B        |      0|
|Frank  |A        |      0|
:::
:::
